definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Michael Jackson (1958-2009), American musician and entertainer
pinyin: Mai4 ke4 er3 · Jie2 ke4 xun4

definition: Michael Crichton (1942-), US techno-thriller writer, author of Jurassic Park
pinyin: Mai4 ke4 er3 · Ke4 lai2 dun4

sentences.english: I think he thought, If Michael can do it, I can do it.
sentences.chinese: 我想他是觉得如果迈克尔能做到，他也能做到。

sentences.english: The application of Michelson interference principle in measuring small displacement is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍迈克尔逊干涉仪原理在测微小位移中的应用。

sentences.english: This is Michael in Mr. Emory's office.
sentences.chinese: 这是埃默里先生办公室的迈克尔。

sentences.english: Michael Vick is being indicted again for staging dogfights.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔Vick由于筹划斗狗再次遭到起诉。

sentences.english: Karen tows Michael to his sister's bedside. He gazes at the tiny infant losing the battle to live.
sentences.chinese: 凯伦拉着迈克尔来到妹妹床前。

sentences.english: Prince Michael of Kent presented the prizes.
sentences.chinese: 肯特亲王迈克尔颁发了奖品。

sentences.english: An interesting lyric of Michaels, cryptic and ambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔斯有趣的抒情，神秘和暧昧。

sentences.english: She never let Michael see how hard this was on her.
sentences.chinese: 她从不让迈克尔看出这对她来说是多么难以承受。

sentences.english: I reflected on what Michael said.
sentences.chinese: 我琢磨着迈克尔的这席话。

sentences.english: Germany. The Michael Jordan of war took a pass.
sentences.chinese: 德国，战争的迈克尔乔丹，都不去。

sentences.english: I confided my worries to Michael.
sentences.chinese: 我把我的担心透露给了迈克尔。

sentences.english: It was Michael, and I quickly learned he was always like that.
sentences.chinese: 这就是迈克尔，我很快就得知他一贯如此。

sentences.english: Michael confronts Roland about setting them up, but he denies it.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔逼问是否罗兰德出卖了他们，他抵死不认。

sentences.english: Chelsea have signed Ballack and John Obi Mikel and there is competition.
sentences.chinese: 切尔西已经和布来克和迈克尔签了约，这就是竞争。

sentences.english: As Michael flees in the woods, Ferguson spots him.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔奔逃出森林，费格斯看见了他。

sentences.english: Ted and Michael go to a "see the light" meeting to let Emmett know they support him.
sentences.chinese: 泰德和迈克尔到“看见光明”聚会对埃米特表达支持。
